meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Established offices
section.content: Each of the offices specified in column 2 of Schedule 1 and column 1 of Schedule 2 is, for the purposes of the Ordinance, declared to be an established office.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Established office deemed to be such from certain date
section.leadIn: An office to which the declaration in section 1 applies is deemed to be an established office from the date specified in—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: column 3 of Schedule 1 opposite the mention in column 2 of Schedule 1 of that office; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: column 2 of Schedule 2 opposite the mention in column 1 of Schedule 2 of that office.
